channel.title: CVE Feed for HP Inc. -- HP PC products using AMI UEFI Firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HP Inc. -- HP PC products using AMI UEFI Firmware

item.title: CVE-2022-43779|2024-08-03T13:40:06.295Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20products%20using%20ami%20uefi%20firmware
item.description: A potential Time-of-Check to Time-of-Use (TOCTOU) vulnerability has been identified in certain HP PC products using AMI UEFI Firmware (system BIOS) which might allow arbitrary code execution, denial of service, and information disclosure. AMI has released updates to mitigate the potential vulnerability.
